thread.section_title: Hotel Belleclaire - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hidden spot
thread.title_full: Great hidden spot - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TolinRiedel
title: Great hidden spot
text:
It's a nice little place tucked away in the Upper West Side, near a lot of good food and easy access to the subway. It's been refurbished, but the rooms still feel a little old-fashioned, if modernized and always very clean - but that helps keep the price down (for Manhattan, of course). The service is very good and helpful.
Room Tip: ask to be put on a higher floor for less noise See more room tips
